column2: ? Long + Net errors = 48% of all mistakes
? TOO MUCH TOPSPIN on punch/push shots (dinks, drops, resets)
? Apply 'Punch vs Brush' framework: push soft shots, topspin power shots
You win longer rallies (7.3 vs 6.6 shots) - patience WORKS for you!
